response.job_title: Global MBA at EDHEC Business School | Project Management | Project Finance | PMP | Business Development |
response.summary: As a Global MBA, Mechanical Engineer, Project Management Professional (PMP), I have accumulated over six years of experience in EPC for mega projects in the petrochemical industry. My expertise lies in all phases of Engineering, Procurement, and Construction (EPC) in cost, planning, and risk control. I bring a strong work ethic, teamwork, and a passion for sustainable, complex and large-scale projects to my work.
response.skills: Project Finance, Engineering, Procurement, and Construction (EPC), Sustainability Consulting, Financial Analysis, Business Development, Innovation Development, Project Management, Data Analysis, Microsoft Excel, Leadership, Business Innovation, Cost Control, Scheduling, Cost Management, Process Optimization

profile_positions.description:
- Executed the financial management of operations, prioritizing effective budget control and profit optimization to enhance operational efficiency for complex projects in Egypt, Maurice, USA, and Norway.
- Lead the implementation and monitoring of budgets, ensuring alignment with strategic objectives and making data-driven analyses as needed.
-  Prepared meticulous monthly, quarterly, and annual financial accounts, forecasting turnover, margin, and cash flow for the site's sustained growth.
- Identified potential risks and operational malfunctions, implemented appropriate corrective measures, and executed active process control points to address challenges proactively.
profile_positions.title: Senior Financial Controller

profile_positions.description:
- Executed monitoring and controlling process for international EPC multi-million-dollar projects in Technip Houston and Technip Barcelona by remotely giving full-time technical assistance and delivering precise statistics for clients such as Qatargas, Chevron Philips Chemical, and Covestro.
- Administered the initiation, planning, monitoring, control, and closing of planning, costs, and risks stages of all projects executed in Peru during 2019-2021. 
- Selected as one of the 45 participants among 550 employees for “Technip Colombia Future”, an initiative focused on mapping the roadmap for digital transformation for the next ten years.
profile_positions.title: Planning and Cost Control Specialist

profile_positions.description:
•	Reduced by 75% the time required to evaluate the feasibility of any self-generation and/or cogeneration projects for industrial clients, by establishing an automatized method validated with TEDOM Engines.
•	Published a new agribusiness perspectives study by planning and executing market research for the generation of solid biofuels from palm agro-industrial waste. The study was distributed to all palm companies (64) by the National Federation of Oil Palm Growers, achieving one of its strategic goals.
•	Increased 30% in sales by creating and executing a sales strategy for renewable energy projects.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

profile_positions.description:
R&ID Experience:
1. Elaborated on a theoretical combustion model of solid biofuel from palm oil wastes through the torrefaction process, providing results for the technical feasibility of new agro-waste pellets as a fuel.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

company.name: Bouygues Travaux Publics
company.description:
CONSTRUIRE DES INFRASTRUCTURES DURABLES

Bouygues TP est l’un des leaders mondiaux dans les domaines de l’aménagement du territoire et de la construction d’infrastructures durables. Filiale de Bouygues Construction spécialisée dans le génie civil et les ouvrages d’art, l’entreprise dispose de compétences et d’un savoir-faire reconnu dans la réalisation de travaux souterrains, de travaux fluviaux et maritimes, de projets linéaires, de génie civil industriel, d’activités de terrassement et de mines à ciel ouvert. De Hong Kong au Canada, Bouygues TP a réalisé de nombreux projets emblématiques : le tunnel sous la Manche, le front de mer de Beyrouth, les autoroutes A28 et A41, les ponts de l’île de Ré et de Normandie, l’arche de confinement de Tchernobyl, les métros du Caire et de Sydney, plus de 10 tunnels à Hong Kong. Partout dans le monde, hommes et femmes, nous sommes tous engagés pour innovés et créer de la valeur pour nos clients. 

Retrouvez plus d’informations sur www.bouygues-construction.com


CONSTRUCTING SUSTAINABLE INFRASTRUCTURES

Bouygues TP is one of the global leaders in the fields of setting territories and the construction of sustainable infrastructures. As a subsidiary of Bouygues Construction specialised in civil engineering and related structures, the company has skills and recognised expertise in underground works, river and maritime works, linear projects, industrial civil engineering, earthworks and surface mining. From Hong Kong to Canada, Bouygues TP has completed numerous iconic projects: the Channel Tunnel, the Beirut seafront, the A28 and A41 motorways, the Ile de Ré and Normandy bridges, Chernobyl’s New Safe Confinement arch, Cairo and Sydney undergrounds, and over 10 tunnels in Hong Kong. Throughout the world, men and women in our company are all committed to innovate and create value for our clients. 

For further information, go to www.bouygues-construction.com
